name: MaiCoin
introduce: MaiCoin Group is Taiwan's largest legal digital asset trading group employing blockchain technology. Founded in 2013, it is the pioneer of Taiwan's crypto industry that commits to promoting digital assets to the mainstream and offering clients secure and diverse options. Currently, MaiCoin Group provides digital asset transactions, crypto-related products or services, and enterprise blockchain applications. Our businesses include MaiCoin, MAX, AMIS, Qubic NFT and MaiCapital.
